title: 我的世界怎么进不去，各位版主帮帮忙
txt_content:
Mods loaded: 1
ModLoader Beta 1.3_01v3
      Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      
Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.

OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
Java: 1.6.0_24, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.

 at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)

这是神马意思啊！

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
老問題... 大家都不看一下問答區舊帖...

1. 更新顯卡驅動 OpenGL support
2. 試著調整硬件加速
桌面右鍵-顯示選項卡-高級-疑難解答選項卡-硬件加速-把條子拉到左數2或3格，不同顯卡格數不同
3. 用這帖子的優化方案  http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-6398-1-3.html

green丶bastard 发表于 2011-7-24 17:30 
1. 更新顯卡
2. 優化：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-6398-1-3.html
呵呵，你来马后炮啊。。。？是简写？

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 馬後炮個屁 那個帖子本來就是我寫的我有轉載權

replies.txt_content: 同求啊偶偶爷爷同求啊啊啊啊啊啊啊
